sa pra#tnaqva >1, nni kAvyE >2, ndra#M ~MvO viqSvataqsparI>3, ndraqM nara#H>4 ||
tvaM na#H sOma viqSvatOq rakShA# rAjannaGAyaqtaH | 
na ri#ShyEqt tvAva#taqH saKA$H ||
yA tEq dhAmA#ni diqvi yA pRu#thiqvyAM ~MyA parva#tEqShvOSha#dhIShvaqPsu || 
tEBi#rnOq viSva$H suqmanAq ahE#Daqn rAjan$th-sOmaq prati# haqvyA gRu#BAya || 
agnI#ShOmAq savE#dasAq sahU#tI vanataqM gira#H | 
saM dE#vaqtrA ba#BUvathuH || 
yuqva - [  ]  51
